event.title: SFD Party in Vienna
event.body: On Saturday, the 17th of September 2011, Software Freedom Day Events are celebrated all around the world, therefore the Vienna Fellowship is inviting you to a Software Freedom Party. The evening will be opened by a talk about legal aspects in Free Software, held by FSFE's new legal coordinator Matija Å uklje. Following this opening everybody is invited to have a nice evening at the Metalab with us.
